call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - October 23rd

commitments.commitment: Check new website drafts in coming days and launch when ready
commitments.quote: I can check it in days and and then, yeah, let's see when it will be launched

commitments.commitment: Jump on chain cache basis chat later with silver sense
commitments.quote: I will jump on chain cache basis chat a bit later with silver sense and so on

open_questions.question: How to find and organize Kadena community for potential collaboration
open_questions.context: Kadena company shutting down, looking for actual community members vs paid shillers

open_questions.question: Should bring Kadena community to Rosen Bridge as wrapped assets rather than suggesting they switch mining algorithms
open_questions.context: Alternative approach to helping Kadena users

key_facts.fact: Kadena market cap is currently 20 million
key_facts.speaker: qx

key_facts.fact: Exchange listings have been 70% of Ergo expenses and most were wasted
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: From 2019 exchange listings, only ProBit is still alive, Hotbit disappeared
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Ergo Foundation was established November or December 2019, a month after mainnet launch
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: By the time EF was established, Ergo was already listed on 5-6 exchanges
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Kadena Telegram group has 35,000 people but no apparent community organization
key_facts.speaker: kushti
